title: Buttermilk Pancakes
instructions: In small mixing bowl, combine all of the ingredients and mix well. Pour by spoonfuls onto a hot, oiled griddle. Spread the batter with the back of the spoon to make thin, crepe-like pancakes. Cook until the batter is bubbly. Turn over. Serve immediately with butter and syrup or favorite fruit sauce.
source: Recipe courtesy Elizabeth Gilroy, Talkeetna, AK
